# Copilot / AI Agent Instructions — stjernejakt-barnas-bel-nning

Project: Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind (shadcn-ui).
Quick commands:
- Install: npm install
- Dev: npm run dev  (http://localhost:8080/)
- Build: npm run build  (creates dist/)
- Preview: npm run preview  (http://localhost:4173/)
Key files: src/, public/, package.json, vite.config.ts, tailwind.config.ts

cd C:\Users\haako\Downloads\App\stjernejakt-barnas-bel-nning-main
cmd /c "npm run lint"
